Salinas.Jose Eusebio Boronda Adobe:
The Jose Eusebio Boronda Adobe is a Monterey Colonial style building from 1846, located in Salinas, Monterey County, California.
This was the in-town Spanish Colonial adobe and wood home of José Eusebio Boronda, who was the grantee of Rancho Rincon de Sanjon that was located to the northwest of Salinas.


== Landmark ==
The Jose Eusebio Boronda Adobe was listed on the National Register of Historic Places in 1973, and is a California Historical Landmark.
